name: Stanley M. SHEPP, Petitioner v. Tracey L. SHEPP, a/k/a Tracey L. Roberts, Respondent

parties: Stanley M. SHEPP, Petitioner v. Tracey L. SHEPP, a/k/a Tracey L. Roberts, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 29th day of September 2003, we GRANT the Petition for Allowance of Appeal, and LIMIT it to the following question:
To what extent can the courts limit parents from advocating religious beliefs that, if acted upon, would constitute criminal conduct?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
832 A.2d 1064
Stanley M. SHEPP, Petitioner v. Tracey L. SHEPP, a/k/a Tracey L. Roberts, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 29, 2003.
